meta.title: Play Fortnite | Xbox Cloud Gaming (Beta) on Xbox.com
meta.description: Play Fortnite with Xbox Cloud Gaming (Beta). Join the Resistance in the final battle to free the Zero Point! The IO has lined up guards and sky stations, but the Resistance is equipped with new tactics like sprinting, mantling, and more. Board an Armored Battle Bus to be a powerful force or attach a Cow Catcher to your truck for extra ramming power. Take on your opponents in the ultimate battle for the Zero Point in Chapter 3 Season 2: Resistance! Fortnite is the always evolving, multiplayer game where you and your friends battle to be the last one standing or collaborate to create your dream Fortnite world. Play both Battle Royale and Fortnite Creative for free or purchase Fortnite’s PvE Campaign mode, Save the World. Download now and jump into the action.

Take on your opponents in the ultimate battle for the Zero Point in Chapter 3 Season 2: Resistance! Fortnite is the always evolving, multiplayer game where you and your friends battle to be the last one standing or collaborate to create your dream Fortnite world. Play both Battle Royale and Fortnite Creative for free or purchase Fortnite’s PvE Campaign mode, Save the World. Download now and jump into the action.

open_graph.title: Play Fortnite | Xbox Cloud Gaming (Beta) on Xbox.com
open_graph.description: Play Fortnite with Xbox Cloud Gaming (Beta). Join the Resistance in the final battle to free the Zero Point! The IO has lined up guards and sky stations, but the Resistance is equipped with new tactics like sprinting, mantling, and more. Board an Armored Battle Bus to be a powerful force or attach a Cow Catcher to your truck for extra ramming power. Play both Battle Royale and Fortnite Creative for free or purchase Fortnite’s PvE Campaign mode, Save the World. Download now and jump into the action.
